title: Ask A Farmer | Ep. 2 | Peach Farmer

tasks.task: Answering questions about peach production in Arkansas.
subtasks: Describe the challenges faced by peach orchards in Arkansas.
Explain how long peach trees can bear fruit.
Discuss the annual calendar of activities related to peach production.
Describe the effect of peach fuzz on the fruit.
Explain the difference between free stone and cling peaches.
Provide guidance on growing peach trees from pits.
Discuss animal threats to peach orchards.
Offer advice on pest control for peaches.
Explain the origin of the phrase "feeling peachy."
